title: Access to the PBE
body: How do you actually know when can create your PBE account ? Do you get a message even if you are not connected ?

replies.body: You can check the status of your application through the [PBE main page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup).  If your application is still pending then you will remain at Step 2.  Hope that helps, and good luck!
You get an email and its pretty obvious :3
